scripts.dev: dotenv -e ./apps/server/.env.development -- pnpm db:prisma:generate && pnpm run --parallel dev
scripts.db:migrate: dotenv -e ./apps/server/.env.development -- pnpm db:prisma:generate && pnpm run --filter=server db:migrate
scripts.db:migrate:new: dotenv -e ./apps/server/.env.development -- pnpm db:prisma:generate && pnpm run --filter=server db:migrate:new
scripts.db:seed: dotenv -e ./apps/server/.env.development -- pnpm db:prisma:generate && pnpm run --filter=server db:seed
scripts.prod:server: dotenv -e ./apps/server/.env.production -- pnpm db:prisma:generate && pnpm run --parallel --filter=server prod
scripts.prod:web: dotenv -e ./apps/server/.env.production -- pnpm db:prisma:generate && pnpm run --parallel --filter=web prod
